items.title: Experts say extreme winter conditions are exerting pressure on agriculture ‘in ways we haven’t seen for a very, very long time’
items.description: A nasty dose of winter weather has pummeled much of the U.S. from Kansas to the East Coast.

items.title: Members of Congress again outperformed the stock market, report shows
items.description: "When Congress members consistently outperform benchmarks like the S&P 500, it raises serious questions about fairness."

items.title: The Surgeon General says he’s ‘deeply disturbed’ after talking to Americans. These 3 factors could help
items.description: “As I finish my tenure as Surgeon General, this is my parting prescription, my final wish for all of us: Choose community.”

items.title: This year is your last chance to get these two types of Girl Scout cookies
items.description: Last year’s retired flavor saw eBay sellers asking up to $50 per box.

items.title: Coinbase scores win against SEC as judge agrees to escalate dispute over crypto security definition
items.description: Coinbase and the SEC have been locked in legal proceedings about whether the crypto exchange is violating securities laws.
